overview:
Saba Ghole is an architectural/urban designer and strategist.

She received her Masters in Urban Design at MIT. Her multidisciplinary explorations in painting, photography, graphic design, film, architecture and urban planning have formed her holistic understanding of design, creative education and the interfacing of people and their environments.
